property.name: Text
property.value: Army units that retreat from this planet are destroyed instead. Each other [Astra Militarum] unit you control at a [STRONGPOINT] planet (green) gets +1 ATK and gains, 'Cannot retreat or be routed'.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After a combat round at this planet ends, you may pay 1[RESOURCE]. If you do not, retreat this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a combat round ends, if you control an [Astra Militarum] unit at the planet where the battle is taking place, put 1 Guardsman token into play at that planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only during a battle. Combat Action: Sacrifice a unit at a planet with your warlord to have that planet gain a [STRONGPOINT] icon (green) until the end of the battle. Then, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Commissar unit. Attached unit gets +1 ATK Reaction: After an army unit you control at this planet leaves play, deal 1 damage to a target army unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may include common [Astra Militarum] cards in your deck, but cannot include other out of faction cards. Reaction: After this warlord commits to a planet, move 1 [Astra Militarum] unit you control from an adjacent planet to this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit commits to a planet, if you control an [Astra Militarum] unit at this planet, ready this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support and return an [Astra Militarum] army unit at a planet to your hand to put a [Tau] unit with equal or lower printed cost into play from your hand at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Until the end of the phase, each [Tau] unit you control at a target planet get +2 HP and each [Astra Militarum] unit you control at the targeted planet get +2 ATK.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a unit. Interrupt: When attached unit damages an enemy unit by an attack, if no shield card was used during this attack, double the damage taken.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this unit to move it to a target planet with an enemy warlord and without any units you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unstoppable - The first time this unit is assigned damage this round, prevent 1 of that damage and this unit gets +2 ATK until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a battle at a [Tech] planet (blue), draw a card for each Black Templars unit you control at that planet. (Max 1 per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Goes Fasta! - While your opponent has the initiative, this unit cannot be dealt damage by units while you control an army unit at this planet not named 'Rickety Warbuggy'.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an [Ork] army unit. Attached unit gains the Blue trait. Attached unit gains Immune to enemy events.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit resolves an attack, deal 1 damage to this unit to deal 1 damage to an enemy army unit at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Destroy each army unit with printed cost 2 or lower at each [Tech] planet (blue).

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gets -5 ATK while attacking a warlord or undamaged army unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent cannot deploy copies of the attached card. Reaction: After an enemy army unit is destroyed by an attack, if no card is attached to this support, attach that unit to this support.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy this unit, look at the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck. Discard any number of those cards with 1 or more shield icons and place the remaining cards on top of his deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When you win a command struggle at a [Strongpoint] planet (green), put this unit into play from your discard pile or hand at that planet instead of taking the planet's card and resource bonuses.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Reaction: After you move a unit you control from one planet to another, exhaust this support to exhaust a non-Elite army unit at the same planet as the unit just moved.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit destroys an army unit by an attack, ready this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit you control. Damage dealt by attached unit cannot be prevented.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a unit you control at this planet takes damage, move all of that damage to this warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Deal 2 damage to this unit to have it get +2 ATK for its next attack this phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Exhaust this support to resolve a battle at a non-first planet without a warlord. Use this ability only if no battle has been initiated this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Deal 1 damage to each undamaged unit at a target planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Attached unit gains Brutal while it is hale. Attached unit gains Armorbane while it is Bloodied.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a Kabalite or Raider unit enters play under your control at a [Material] planet (red), gain 1[Resource]. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Pay 2 [Resource] to draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose any number of undamaged enemy army units at a target planet. Until the end of the phase, treat each of those units as if its printed text box were blank.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 Relic per player. Attach to a unique unit. Reaction: After attached unit damages an army unit by an attack, the attacked unit gets -3 ATK until the end of phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After this unit damages an enemy unit by an attack, sacrifice it to search the top 6 cards of your deck for a Black Templars unit with cost 4 or lower. Put that unit into play at this planet, and shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 Relic per player. Attach to a Black Templars army unit. Reaction: After attached unit is declared as a defender, deal 2 damage to the attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit is at a [Strongpoint] planet (green) it gets +1 ATK and +1 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice this support to either put a Guardsman token into play at a planet or put 2 Guardsman tokens into play at a [Strongpoint] planet (green).

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit must be declared as a defender, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Goes Fasta! - While your opponent has the initiative, this unit gets +4 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Target a planet where a battle is taking place. Until the end of the battle, after each unit at the targeted planet resolves an attack, deal 1 damage to it. If the targeted planet is a [Material] planet (red), this effect only deals damage to enemy units instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: A Warrior unit you control at this planet must be declared as a defender, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust a non-Elite army unit at a planet with a Psyker army unit you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this unit leaves play, attach each attachment on it to a target eligible unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a non-[TAU] unit is deployed at this planet, move this unit to an adjacent planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit. Attached unit gets +2 ATK and +1 HP. If attached unit is a non-K unit, it gains 1 command icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hive Mind - Each Termagant token you control at this planet gains Flying.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a planet is infested, exhaust this support to take either the card bonus or the resource bonus of that planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may include common Vehicle units from both the [Astra Militarum] and [Space Marine] factions, but cannot include other cards from a non-[Ork] faction. Interrupt: When you deploy an [Astra Militarum] or [Space Marine] unit, reduce its cost by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: Text
property.value: Goes Fasta! - While your opponent has the initiative, this unit gets +2 ATK.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Vehicle unit you control loses all faction affiliations and gain the [Ork] faction affiliation. [Ork] Vehicle units you control get +1 ATK and +1HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After your warlord damages a Vehicle army unit by an attack, gain control of that unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Attached unit gets +2HP and gains 'Reaction: After a Vehicle unit is destroyed at this planet, ready this unit. (Limit once per phase.)'

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy this unit to a [Tech] planet (blue), destroy a target Location support card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support to move a [Space Marine] army unit you control with printed cost 3 or lower from a [Tech] planet (blue) to an adjacent planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice this unit to destroy a target exhausted support card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this unit leaves play, ready another target army unit you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a battle at a [Strongpoint] planet (green), move up to 2 non-warlord units you control at that planet to a target planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit resolves an attack against an enemy army unit, deal X unpreventable damage to a target enemy unit at this planet. X is the number of command icons the targeted unit has

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit is at a [Tech] planet (blue) it gains:

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit. Attached unit gets +2 ATK. Bloodthirst - During a combat round in which 1 or more units have been destroyed at this planet, attached unit gains Brutal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit damages an army unit by an attack, discard 1 card at random from your opponent's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Kabalite army unit. Reaction: After attached unit is declared as a defender, exhaust this attachment to cancel the remainder of the attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit destroys an army unit by an attack, exhaust a target enemy army unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit you control. Limit 1 per unit. Combat Action: Exhaust this attachment to move attached unit to a planet with a type shared with this planet. Then, deal 1 damage to an army unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy this unit, search the top 9 cards of your deck for up to 2 [Tau] attachments with printed cost 2 or lower. Put each eligible attachment into play attached to this unit. Then, shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Exhaust each ready Soldier unit you control at a target planet to deal damage equal to their combined printed ATK value to a target enemy army unit at the targeted planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When you deploy a non-K unit, exhaust this support to reduce that unit's cost by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard 1 or more unit cards from your hand to gain [Resource] equal to the number of cards discarded by this effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Genestealer card in your hand may be deployed to infested planets as if it had ambush.

property.name: Text
property.value: eaction: After you deploy this unit, target an enemy army unit at this planet. Until the end of the phase, the targeted unit gets -1 HP and this unit gets +1 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: ombat Action: Exhaust and sacrifice this support to ready each Genestealer unit you control at a target planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a Genestealer unit you control destroys an enemy unit with printed cost 3 or lower by an attack, put that unit into play from your opponent's discard pile under your control at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may deploy this attachment from your discard pile. Attach to an army unit you control. Attached unit gets +3 ATK and -1 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unstoppable - The first time this unit is assigned damage this round, prevent 1 of that damage and you may trigger the Battle ability of this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a battle at a [Tech] planet (blue), choose another planet in play and a planet that has been removed from the game. Switch the chosen planets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Black Templars unit. Attached unit gets +1 HP. Action: Sacrifice this attachment to put a Relic attachment into play from your hand attached to attached unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a combat round at a [Strongpoint] planet ends (green), move this unit to that planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a non-warlord unit. Attached unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP. Interrupt: When attached unit leaves play, return this attachment to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit is at a [Material] planet (red), it gains:

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After your combat turn ends, take a combat turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Exhaust this support to have each player deal an amount of indirect damage equal to the number of cards in his hand among units he controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you sacrifice a Cultist token, reduce the cost of the next Elite unit you deploy this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support to move an Elite unit you control from a [Tech] planet (blue) to another planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you gain 1 or more [Resource], ready this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a Kabalite unit enters play at this planet, deal 1 damage to a target undamaged unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a battle at a [Material] planet (red), gain 3[Resource]. (Max 1 per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After another unit moves from this planet to another, move this unit to that planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When you deploy an [Eldar] Vehicle or [Eldar] Drone unit, exhaust this support to reduce its cost by 2 (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: Text
property.value: For each non-[TAU] unit you control at this planet, this unit gets +1 ATK.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Pilot or Vehicle unit. Combat Action: Exhaust attached unit to deal 2 damage to each exhausted enemy unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Deal 1 damage to a target [Space Marine] unit you control at a [Tech] planet (blue). The targeted unit gets +1 ATK until the end of the phase. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Unstoppable - The first time this unit is assigned damage this round, prevent 1 of that damage and ready this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: A target ready enemy army unit at this planet must be declared as an attacker and this unit declared as a defender during your opponent's next combat turn, if able. (Limit once per combat round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a unit you control is assigned damage by an attack, exhaust this support to prevent 1 of that damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a [Space Marine] unit you control takes damage, it gets +3 ATK for its next attack this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a unit you control. Attached unit gains, 'Unstoppable - The first time this unit is assigned damage this round, prevent 1 of that damage and remove 1 damage from this unit.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a battle at a non-first [Strongpoint] planet (green), instead of triggering the planet's Battle ability, put this unit into play from your hand at a [Strongpoint] planet (green).

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Exhaust this support to target up to 1 non-Elite enemy army unit at each [Strongpoint]planet (green). Exhaust each targeted unit. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit destroys an enemy unit by an attack, put an [Ork] unit with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your hand at an adjacent planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a non-warlord unit. Attached unit gets +4 ATK. Attached unit cannot ready between combat rounds during the combat phase

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When an enemy unit is destroyed, deploy this unit from your hand at the same planet as the destroyed unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support to have each unit at a target planet lose Ranged until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit. Limit 1 per unit. Reaction: After you win a command struggle at this planet, deal 2 damage to a target unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy this unit, you may move each Kabalite army unit you control to a [Material] planet (red).

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Target a planet. Put a Kabalite unit with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your hand exhausted at the targeted planet. Then, if the targeted planet is a [Material] planet (red), ready up to 2 Kabalite units at that planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit is at a [Strongpoint] planet (green) it gets +1 ATK and +1 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Target up to 1 enemy unit at each [Strongpoint] planet (green). Deal 2 damage to each targeted unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Warrior army unit. Attached unit gets +3 ATK.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit is at a [Material] planet (red), it gains:

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a support card you control would be targeted, exhaust this support to have this card be targeted instead (ignoring targeting restrictions).

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a command struggle at an infested planet, exhaust a target non-Elite army unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy this unit, search the top 6 cards of your deck for a Genestealer card. Reveal it, add it to your hand, and place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Return a [Tyranid] army unit at a planet to your hand to put a [Tyranid] army unit with equal or lower printed cost and a different name into play from your hand at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each unit you control at this planet with the Psyker or Warrior trait gets +1 HP. While you control a Psyker unit and a Warrior unit at this planet, each unit you control at this planet with the Psyker or Warrior trait gets +1 ATK.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a Psyker unit you control is declared as an attacker, move this unit to the same planet as that unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Discard a Warrior card from your hand to ready this unit. (Limit once per combat round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Headquarters Action: Exhaust this support to choose Psyker or Warrior. Then, search the top 3 cards of your deck for a unit with the named Trait. Reveal it, add it to your hand, and place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: ction: Either (choose one): gain 1[Resource], have a Warrior unit you control get +1 ATK until the end of the phase, or exhaust a Psyker unit you control and move it from one planet to another.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a unit you control. Attached unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP. If attached unit is an army unit it, gains the Warrior and Psyker traits.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit is at a [Tech] planet (blue), it gains:

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Exhaust this support to put a non-Elite [Space Marine] unit into play from your hand at a [Tech] planet (blue). (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit resolves an attack, it gets +3 ATK until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Put a support card into play from your hand with printed cost equal to or lower than the highest number of army units you control at a planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a [Strongpoint] planet (green). Reduce the cost of each [Astra Militarum] unit you deploy at this planet by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: Text
property.value: While a battle is being resolved at a planet where you are the only player to control a unit named 'Corpulent Ork', your opponent is considered to have the initiative for the purposes of card abilities. (Initiative for determining combat turn order does not change.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Each damaged [Ork] army unit you control gains 1 command icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bloodthirst - During a combat round in which 1 or more units have been destroyed at this planet, this unit gains Armorbane, Brutal, and Flying.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No Wargear Attachments. Immune to Power events.

property.name: Text
property.value: Headquarters Action: Switch a target planet with an adjacent planet. (Units that were at a switched-out planet are now at the switched-in planet.)

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit is at a [Material] planet (red), it gains:

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a command struggle, exhaust this support to move a target Kabalite army unit you control at that planet to a [Material] planet (red). That unit gains 1 command icon until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Kabalite army unit you control. Combat Action: Sacrifice this attachment to exhaust a target enemy non-Elite army unit at this planet. Then, deal damage to that unit equal to its printed ATK value.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy this unit at a [Material] planet (red), gain 1[Resource].

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Errata from Brad Andres: Add Kroot trait

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a command struggle resolves at a planet, exhausted army units you control count their command icons during that command struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit is at an infested planet, it gains:

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support to infest the planet with 2 or more Genestealer units at it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit you control. Action: Pay 1[Resource] to have attached unit get, until the end of the phase, either: +2 ATK or +2 HP.
